metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14345 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in SDDM through 0.17.0. If configured with ReuseSession=true, the password is not checked for users with an already existing session. Any user with access to the system D-Bus can therefore unlock any graphical session. This is related to daemon/Display.cpp and helper/backend/PamBackend.cpp.

criterions.comment: sddm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
